tha-ap405:3.3: sugatapattaṁ → sugatappattaṁ (bj); sugataṁ pattaṁ (si); subhakaṁ pattaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap405:3.4: sappitelaṁ apūrayiṁ → sappitelena pūrayiṁ (bj); sappitelamapūrayiṁ (pts-vp-pli1); sappitelassa'pūrayiṁ (?)
tha-ap405:7.4: arahattaṁ bhavissati → arahā tvaṁ bhavissasi (bj, pts-vp-pli1); arahattaṁ gamissati (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap405:14.2: cajitvā → catvāna (si, mr); datvāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap405:19.1: Aho buddhā aho dhammā → aho buddho aho dhammo (bj)
tha-ap405:22.4: upanidhiṁ → upanidhaṁ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); upanīyaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
